lune-binray-platform.description:
Tauri will look for system-specific binaries following the pattern "{-target-triple}{.system-extension}".
E.g. Tauri looks for:
 - "my-binary-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc.exe" for Windows - "my-binary-x86_64-apple-darwin" for macOS - "my-binary-x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu" for Linux
so don't forget to provide binaries for all targeted platforms.
